resources.string: This activity displays all items in a library including album cover, artist name (Item), and song name (subitem). External libraries will be needed to list items in the view as well as to search items via text or voice.

This activity displays all current information for the current track and artist that is being played. External libraries to pull information from the library such as album art and track information will need to be pulled from a database.
This activity allows user to search stations or related music from the Internet. External libraries will be needed to connect to the network and search entries on an external database.
